text: The flag of Sant Feliu de Guíxols () is a tricolour of white, red, and yellow charged in the center of the red stripe. While the meaning of the colors has changed over time, these three colors were adopted by Hispanic flag. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==References== Sant Feliu de Guíxols Sant Felio de Guíxols
title: Flag of Sant Feliu de Guíxols
